contents: Do any of you know any good restaurants near the Namdong Industrial Complex?

contents: I might need to use public transportation for a while, but I don't have a transportation card. What should I do?
title: How do I make a transportation card?

contents: They were supposed to deposit my salary today, but it still hasn't come through...
title: I'm feeling down because my salary hasn't come in.

contents: 집이 수원역인데 너무 멀지 않은 곳에 갈 곳이 있을까?
title: 주말에 가족들이랑 갈 만 한 곳 추천좀
